title: disconnected repeatedly for a few seconds
body: me and a few others that i know have been getting DC'd repeatedly off and on for a few seconds. happened on home screen of the client and then again in the champ select.

replies.body:
the same thing happened to me and it wouldnt let me open the game so i have afk timer ....thats bull it wasnt even my fault
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same but usually ingame not pregame

With just the client open, i sometimes am getting disconnected from the chat, and last hour or so, seems disconnected from the client as well.
My connection seems to be fine if i go to any other site.

I've been seeing quite a few players talking about possible server issues today, but it's strange that the servers themselves haven't been messing up. However, I have actually been noticing more and more player's mentioning the ISP they're running, and I was able to figure out that Charter Spectrum has had quite a few outage issues today. Let me know if you're on Charter as well, and if so you may need to contact them to report this as well.
ok so its not just me.  +1 also having this problem
